1.0.name: wordpress/tappd
1.0.description: Tappd is a Wordpress plugin dedicated to displaying different types of feeds from the Untappd API. These feeds include beer, brewery, venue and user. The plugin will show checkins either in a widget, or by the use of a shortcode. The output is classed so that you may style the plugin however you wish.
